front.title: IEEE Standard for AC High-Voltage Generator Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Ratings, performance requirements, and compliance test methods are provided for ac high-voltage generator circuit breakers rated on a symmetrical current basis that are installed between the generator and the transformer terminals. Guidance for applying generator circuit breakers is given. Pumped storage installations are considered a special application, and their requirements are not completely covered by this standard.
